The bakery's sweet smell used to fill the street. But the new owner mismanaged everything - ordering too much flour, forgetting deliveries, ignoring staff. Soon, shelves stood empty. The "Closed Forever" sign now hangs where golden loaves once beckoned. A lesson in how not to run a business.
